title: Juggling
alt: Later: 'Why is there a book hovering over the trash can?'
transcript: [The panel shows a close up of Cueball reading a book. The book is called "How To Juggle" and has a picture of a person juggling on the cover.][The view now shows the entirety of Cueball. The book is splayed on the floor behind them, and he is holding some juggling balls.][Cueball throws the juggling balls in the air.][He lowers his arms to prepare to catch the balls. The balls are hovering in mid-air.][Cueball now stands with his arms by his sides. The balls have not moved and are still suspended in mid-air.][Cueball jumps, trying to grab the lowest ball. He can't reach.][Cueball scratches his head and stares at the still floating juggling balls.][Cueball throws the book into a trash can.]
